location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'The Khalifa, halted at Ctesiphon' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:156 x 190 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘48’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView of the steamer Khalifa [sic for Khalifah] anchored at Ctesiphon. A number of figures stand on deck as well as on shore to the right of the image.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'The Khalifa, halted at Ctesiphon'Pencil, above image at right: ‘48’;’26’
